About me!

Hi, my name is Zien Lyu. Welcome to my website!

I am now a master of Engineering Student at Cornell University, majoring in Financial Engineering. I finished my undergraduate studies in Nanjing University, majoring in Finance.

I enjoy music, cooking, reading and life!
